testcase.name: express_authentication_middleware_basics Should send a 401 if the x-api-key header is not present

testcase.name: express_authentication_middleware_basics Should send a 401 if the x-api-key is invalid

testcase.name: express_authentication_middleware_basics Should validate header for protected routes

testcase.name: express_authentication_middleware_basics Should not require auth headers for unprotected routes
